Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
import requests
# Get proxy wallet contract ABI from PolygonScan  
proxy_address = ''0x9c76847744942b41d3bBDcFE5A3B98AE67a95750''

# Check if it''s a gnosis safe style contract
from web3 import Web3
w3 = Web3\(Web3.HTTPProvider\(''https://polygon-rpc.com''\)\)

# Get bytecode to see what kind of contract it is
code = w3.eth.get_code\(proxy_address\)
print\(f''Contract has {len\(code\)} bytes of code''\)

# Try to call common safe functions
safe_abi = [
    {''inputs'': [], ''name'': ''getOwners'', ''outputs'': [{''type'': ''address[]''}], ''stateMutability'': ''view'', ''type'': ''function''},
    {''inputs'': [], ''name'': ''getThreshold'', ''outputs'': [{''type'': ''uint256''}], ''stateMutability'': ''view'', ''type'': ''function''},
]
try:
    contract = w3.eth.contract\(address=Web3.to_checksum_address\(proxy_address\), abi=safe_abi\)
    owners = contract.functions.getOwners\(\).call\(\)
    threshold = contract.functions.getThreshold\(\).call\(\)
    print\(f''Owners: {owners}''\)
    print\(f''Threshold: {threshold}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Not a standard safe: {e}''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from web3 import Web3
w3 = Web3\(Web3.HTTPProvider\(''https://polygon-rpc.com''\)\)

proxy_address = ''0x9c76847744942b41d3bBDcFE5A3B98AE67a95750''

# Polymarket uses a specific proxy pattern - let''s check the implementation slot
# EIP-1967 implementation slot
impl_slot = ''0x360894a13ba1a3210667c828492db98dca3e2076cc3735a920a3ca505d382bbc''
impl = w3.eth.get_storage_at\(proxy_address, impl_slot\)
print\(f''EIP-1967 impl: {impl.hex\(\)}''\)

# Also check admin slot
admin_slot = ''0xb53127684a568b3173ae13b9f8a6016e243e63b6e8ee1178d6a717850b5d6103''
admin = w3.eth.get_storage_at\(proxy_address, admin_slot\)
print\(f''Admin: {admin.hex\(\)}''\)

# First storage slot \(often owner in simple proxies\)
slot0 = w3.eth.get_storage_at\(proxy_address, 0\)
print\(f''Slot 0: {slot0.hex\(\)}''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
# EIP-1167 minimal proxy bytecode format:
# 363d3d373d3d3d363d73[IMPL_ADDRESS]5af43d82803e903d91602b57fd5bf3
bytecode = ''363d3d373d3d3d363d7344e999d5c2f66ef0861317f9a4805ac2e90aeb4f5af43d82803e903d91602b57fd5bf3''

# Extract implementation address \(20 bytes after the prefix\)
# Prefix is: 363d3d373d3d3d363d73 \(10 bytes = 20 hex chars\)
impl_hex = bytecode[20:60]  # 40 hex chars = 20 bytes
print\(f''Implementation address: 0x{impl_hex}''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from web3 import Web3
w3 = Web3\(Web3.HTTPProvider\(''https://polygon-rpc.com''\)\)

# Polymarket proxy implementation
impl_address = ''0x44e999d5c2f66ef0861317f9a4805ac2e90aeb4f''

# Common proxy wallet function signatures
proxy_abi = [
    # Owner check
    {''inputs'': [], ''name'': ''owner'', ''outputs'': [{''type'': ''address''}], ''stateMutability'': ''view'', ''type'': ''function''},
    # Execute transaction \(Gnosis Safe style\)
    {''inputs'': [{''name'': ''to'', ''type'': ''address''}, {''name'': ''value'', ''type'': ''uint256''}, {''name'': ''data'', ''type'': ''bytes''}], 
     ''name'': ''exec'', ''outputs'': [{''type'': ''bool''}], ''stateMutability'': ''nonpayable'', ''type'': ''function''},
    {''inputs'': [{''name'': ''to'', ''type'': ''address''}, {''name'': ''value'', ''type'': ''uint256''}, {''name'': ''data'', ''type'': ''bytes''}], 
     ''name'': ''execute'', ''outputs'': [{''type'': ''bool''}], ''stateMutability'': ''nonpayable'', ''type'': ''function''},
]

proxy_address = ''0x9c76847744942b41d3bBDcFE5A3B98AE67a95750''
contract = w3.eth.contract\(address=Web3.to_checksum_address\(proxy_address\), abi=proxy_abi\)

# Try owner\(\)
try:
    owner = contract.functions.owner\(\).call\(\)
    print\(f''Owner: {owner}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''owner\(\) failed: {e}''\)
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from web3 import Web3
w3 = Web3\(Web3.HTTPProvider\(''https://polygon-rpc.com''\)\)

# Let''s try with proxy factory to understand the proxy better
factory_address = ''0xaB45c5A4B0c941a2F231C04C3f49182e1A254052''

# Get implementation from factory
factory_abi = [
    {''inputs'': [], ''name'': ''proxyImpl'', ''outputs'': [{''type'': ''address''}], ''stateMutability'': ''view'', ''type'': ''function''},
    {''inputs'': [], ''name'': ''implementation'', ''outputs'': [{''type'': ''address''}], ''stateMutability'': ''view'', ''type'': ''function''},
]

factory = w3.eth.contract\(address=Web3.to_checksum_address\(factory_address\), abi=factory_abi\)

try:
    impl = factory.functions.proxyImpl\(\).call\(\)
    print\(f''proxyImpl: {impl}''\)
except:
    pass

try:
    impl = factory.functions.implementation\(\).call\(\)
    print\(f''implementation: {impl}''\)
except:
    pass
")

Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from web3 import Web3
w3 = Web3\(Web3.HTTPProvider\(''https://polygon-rpc.com''\)\)

tx_hash = ''0xa6be1bbcb19f5b27e174280e8507dff7fa54e526127239da6368fc0f8a9aec39''
tx = w3.eth.get_transaction\(tx_hash\)

# Get the function selector \(first 4 bytes\)
input_data = tx[''input'']
selector = input_data[:4].hex\(\)
print\(f''Function selector: 0x{selector}''\)
print\(f''To contract: {tx[""to""]}''\)

# Let''s check what contract this is
code_len = len\(w3.eth.get_code\(tx[''to'']\)\)
print\(f''Contract code size: {code_len} bytes''\)

# Check the receipt for logs
receipt = w3.eth.get_transaction_receipt\(tx_hash\)
print\(f''Status: {receipt[""status""]}''\)
print\(f''Gas used: {receipt[""gasUsed""]}''\)
print\(f''Number of logs: {len\(receipt[""logs""]\)}''\)
")

Bash("c:\\Users\\Jack\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\polymarket-copy-bot\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
from collections import defaultdict
from datetime import datetime

# Target trader
TARGET = ''0x63ce342161250d705dc0b16df89036c8e5f9ba9a''
url = f''https://data-api.polymarket.com/activity?user={TARGET}&limit=200''
resp = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\)
trades = [t for t in resp.json\(\) if t.get\(''type'', ''''\).upper\(\) == ''TRADE'']

print\(''=== TARGET TRADER RECENT ACTIVITY ===''\)
print\(f''Total trades: {len\(trades\)}''\)
print\(\)

# Group by market
by_market = defaultdict\(list\)
for t in trades:
    market = t.get\(''title'', ''Unknown''\)[:50]
    by_market[market].append\(t\)

for market, market_trades in sorted\(by_market.items\(\)\):
    if ''Up or Down'' not in market:
        continue
    print\(f''--- {market} ---''\)
    buys = defaultdict\(float\)
    sells = defaultdict\(float\)
    
    for t in market_trades:
        side = t.get\(''side'', ''?''\)
        outcome = t.get\(''outcome'', ''?''\)
        amount = float\(t.get\(''usdcSize'', 0\)\)
        
        if side == ''BUY'':
            buys[outcome] += amount
        elif side == ''SELL'':
            sells[outcome] += amount
    
    for outcome in set\(list\(buys.keys\(\)\) + list\(sells.keys\(\)\)\):
        b = buys.get\(outcome, 0\)
        s = sells.get\(outcome, 0\)
        net = b - s
        print\(f''  {outcome}: Bought {b:.2f} | Sold {s:.2f} | Net: {net:+.2f}''\)
    print\(\)
")

Bash("c:\\Users\\Jack\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\polymarket-copy-bot\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
from datetime import datetime
from collections import defaultdict

TARGET = ''0x63ce342161250d705dc0b16df89036c8e5f9ba9a''
MY_PROXY = ''0x9c76847744942b41d3bbdcfe5a3b98ae67a95750''

# Get a specific market''s trades from both
# Bitcoin Up or Down - January 8, 3PM ET seems active

# Get target trades
url = f''https://data-api.polymarket.com/activity?user={TARGET}&limit=500''
resp = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\)
target_trades = [t for t in resp.json\(\) if t.get\(''type'', ''''\).upper\(\) == ''TRADE'']

# Get our trades
url = f''https://data-api.polymarket.com/activity?user={MY_PROXY}&limit=500''
resp = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\)
our_trades = [t for t in resp.json\(\) if t.get\(''type'', ''''\).upper\(\) == ''TRADE'']

# Focus on one market to compare timing
market_filter = ''Bitcoin Up or Down - January 8, 3PM''

print\(''=== TIMING COMPARISON: Bitcoin 3PM Market ===''\)
print\(\)
print\(''TARGET TRADES:''\)
target_market = [t for t in target_trades if market_filter in t.get\(''title'', ''''\)]
for t in sorted\(target_market, key=lambda x: x.get\(''timestamp'', 0\)\)[:20]:
    ts = t.get\(''timestamp'', 0\)
    if isinstance\(ts, int\):
        time_str = datetime.fromtimestamp\(ts/1000\).strftime\(''%H:%M:%S.%f''\)[:-3]
    else:
        time_str = str\(ts\)
    side = t.get\(''side'', ''?''\)
    outcome = t.get\(''outcome'', ''?''\)
    price = float\(t.get\(''price'', 0\)\)
    amount = float\(t.get\(''usdcSize'', 0\)\)
    print\(f''  {time_str} | {side:4} {outcome:4} @ {price:.0%} | $amount:.2f''\)

print\(\)
print\(''OUR TRADES:''\)
our_market = [t for t in our_trades if market_filter in t.get\(''title'', ''''\)]
for t in sorted\(our_market, key=lambda x: x.get\(''timestamp'', 0\)\)[:20]:
    ts = t.get\(''timestamp'', 0\)
    if isinstance\(ts, int\):
        time_str = datetime.fromtimestamp\(ts/1000\).strftime\(''%H:%M:%S.%f''\)[:-3]
    else:
        time_str = str\(ts\)
    side = t.get\(''side'', ''?''\)
    outcome = t.get\(''outcome'', ''?''\)
    price = float\(t.get\(''price'', 0\)\)
    amount = float\(t.get\(''usdcSize'', 0\)\)
    print\(f''  {time_str} | {side:4} {outcome:4} @ {price:.0%} | $amount:.2f''\)
")

Bash("c:\\Users\\Jack\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\polymarket-copy-bot\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
from collections import defaultdict

TARGET = ''0x63ce342161250d705dc0b16df89036c8e5f9ba9a''
MY_PROXY = ''0x9c76847744942b41d3bbdcfe5a3b98ae67a95750''

# Get positions for comparison
url = f''https://data-api.polymarket.com/positions?user={TARGET}''
target_pos = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\).json\(\)

url = f''https://data-api.polymarket.com/positions?user={MY_PROXY}''
our_pos = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\).json\(\)

# Group by conditionId
def group_positions\(positions\):
    by_market = defaultdict\(dict\)
    for p in positions:
        cid = p.get\(''conditionId'', ''''\)
        outcome = p.get\(''outcome'', ''?''\)
        by_market[cid][outcome] = {
            ''size'': float\(p.get\(''size'', 0\) or 0\),
            ''avgPrice'': float\(p.get\(''avgPrice'', 0\) or 0\),
            ''title'': p.get\(''title'', ''''\)[:40]
        }
    return by_market

target_grouped = group_positions\(target_pos\)
our_grouped = group_positions\(our_pos\)

print\(''=== POSITION COMPARISON \(Cost Basis\) ===''\)
print\(\)
print\(f''{""Market"":<42} | {""Target Up"":>10} | {""Target Dn"":>10} | {""Our Up"":>10} | {""Our Dn"":>10} | {""Ratio Match"":>12}''\)
print\(''-'' * 110\)

for cid, target_data in target_grouped.items\(\):
    our_data = our_grouped.get\(cid, {}\)
    
    title = target_data.get\(''Up'', target_data.get\(''Down'', {}\)\).get\(''title'', ''Unknown''\)
    
    t_up = target_data.get\(''Up'', {}\)
    t_dn = target_data.get\(''Down'', {}\)
    o_up = our_data.get\(''Up'', {}\)
    o_dn = our_data.get\(''Down'', {}\)
    
    t_up_cost = t_up.get\(''size'', 0\) * t_up.get\(''avgPrice'', 0\)
    t_dn_cost = t_dn.get\(''size'', 0\) * t_dn.get\(''avgPrice'', 0\)
    o_up_cost = o_up.get\(''size'', 0\) * o_up.get\(''avgPrice'', 0\)
    o_dn_cost = o_dn.get\(''size'', 0\) * o_dn.get\(''avgPrice'', 0\)
    
    t_total = t_up_cost + t_dn_cost
    o_total = o_up_cost + o_dn_cost
    
    if t_total < 50 or o_total < 1:
        continue
    
    # Target ratio \(% in Up\)
    t_ratio = t_up_cost / t_total if t_total > 0 else 0.5
    o_ratio = o_up_cost / o_total if o_total > 0 else 0.5
    
    ratio_diff = abs\(t_ratio - o_ratio\)
    match_status = ''GOOD'' if ratio_diff < 0.15 else ''BAD'' if ratio_diff > 0.3 else ''OK''
    
    print\(f''{title:<42} | $t_up_cost:>8.0f | $t_dn_cost:>8.0f | $o_up_cost:>8.0f | $o_dn_cost:>8.0f | {t_ratio:.0%} vs {o_ratio:.0%} {match_status}''\)

print\(\)
print\(''Target strategy: Heavier on the side that wins \(gets good prices early\)''\)
print\(''Our problem: We enter AFTER target moves the price, paying worse prices''\)
")

Bash("c:\\Users\\Jack\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\polymarket-copy-bot\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
from datetime import datetime

# Check what markets target is trading
TARGET = ''0x63ce342161250d705dc0b16df89036c8e5f9ba9a''
url = f''https://data-api.polymarket.com/activity?user={TARGET}&limit=20''
resp = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\)
trades = [t for t in resp.json\(\) if t.get\(''type'', ''''\).upper\(\) == ''TRADE'']

print\(''=== TARGET RECENT TRADES ===''\)
seen = set\(\)
for t in trades[:10]:
    title = t.get\(''title'', ''''\)[:50]
    if title in seen:
        continue
    seen.add\(title\)
    ts = datetime.fromtimestamp\(t.get\(''timestamp'', 0\)/1000 if t.get\(''timestamp'', 0\) > 1000000000000 else t.get\(''timestamp'', 0\)\)
    price = float\(t.get\(''price'', 0\)\)
    outcome = t.get\(''outcome'', ''''\)
    print\(f''{ts.strftime\(""%H:%M:%S""\)} | {title} | {outcome} @ {price:.0%}''\)

print\(\)
print\(f''Current time: {datetime.now\(\).strftime\(""%H:%M:%S""\)}''\)
print\(''The 3:15-3:30 market is near resolution, prices are extreme.''\)
print\(''Wait for 3:30 market to open for better trading conditions.''\)
")

import requests
from collections import defaultdict

# Get profitable traders on Polymarket
url = ''https://gamma-api.polymarket.com/markets?closed=false&limit=50''
resp = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\)
markets = resp.json\(\)

print\(''=== ACTIVE NON-CRYPTO MARKETS ===''\)
print\(\)

for m in markets:
    title = m.get\(''question'', ''''\)[:60]
    volume = float\(m.get\(''volume'', 0\) or 0\)

        continue
    
    if volume > 10000:
        print\(f''{title}''\)
        print\(f''  Volume: {volume:,.0f} | Liquidity: {liquidity:,.0f}''\)
        print\(\)
")

Bash("c:\\Users\\Jack\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\polymarket-copy-bot\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
from collections import defaultdict

# Look for active traders on political markets
url = ''https://data-api.polymarket.com/activity?slug=will-tariffs-generate-250b-in-2025&limit=100''
resp = requests.get\(url, timeout=30\)
trades = resp.json\(\)

print\(''=== RECENT TRADERS ON TARIFF MARKET ===''\)
print\(\)

trader_stats = defaultdict\(lambda: {''buys'': 0, ''sells'': 0, ''volume'': 0, ''name'': ''''}\)

for t in trades:
    ttype = t.get\(''type'', ''''\).upper\(\)
    if ttype != ''TRADE'':
        continue
    addr = t.get\(''proxyWallet'', ''''\)
    side = t.get\(''side'', ''''\)
    amount = float\(t.get\(''usdcSize'', 0\) or 0\)
    name = t.get\(''pseudonym'', ''''\) or t.get\(''name'', ''''\)
    
    trader_stats[addr][''volume''] += amount
    trader_stats[addr][''name''] = name
    if side == ''BUY'':
        trader_stats[addr][''buys''] += 1
    else:
        trader_stats[addr][''sells''] += 1

sorted_traders = sorted\(trader_stats.items\(\), key=lambda x: x[1][''volume''], reverse=True\)

for addr, stats in sorted_traders[:10]:
    name = stats[''name''] or addr[:15]
    print\(f''{name}''\)
    print\(f''  Address: {addr}''\)
    print\(f''  Buys: {stats[""buys""]} | Sells: {stats[""sells""]} | Volume: $stats[\\""volume\\""]:.0f''\)
    print\(\)
")
